definition: surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Health Bureau of Shuangliu county Chengdu City, Sichuan Provience. P. R.
sentences.chinese: 中國四川省成都市雙流縣衛生局的英文地址怎麼寫？

sentences.english: If you have other puzzled consult WuSheng county health bureau.
sentences.chinese: 如你還有其他不解請諮詢武勝縣衛生局。

sentences.english: The advice of the Surgeons General was made available to the Assistant to the Secretary of Defense as necessary.
sentences.chinese: 衛生局長的建議有必要被提供給國防部長助理。

sentences.english: The surgeon general had determined that cigarette smoking is dangerous to your health.
sentences.chinese: 衛生局長已測定吸菸危害健康。

sentences.english: Require all frontline staff to wear surgical gloves and masks.
sentences.chinese: 若衛生局建議，其他員工亦須戴上口罩。

sentences.english: York Chow, Hong Kong's Secretary for Food and Health, also attended the event.
sentences.chinese: 香港食物及衛生局局長周一嶽也出席了該活動。

sentences.english: Staff must wear masks at work if advised by CDC/Health Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 若衛生局建議，其他員工亦須戴上口罩。

sentences.english: Its oxygen products also win the "Product Permit" from Shanghai Medical Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 且醫用氧產品獲得上海市衛生局頒發的生產許可證。

sentences.english: Dr. Thorpe is from the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene.
sentences.chinese: Thorpe博士來自紐約市衛生局和心理衛生部。

sentences.english: The bureau reported an infant mortality rate of 466 per 100,000 people.
sentences.chinese: 衛生局的報告稱，嬰兒死亡率爲每10萬中466人。

definition: health bureau (or office, or department, or agency)
environment protection office/PRC National bureau of environmental protection
to call on (sb to do sth)/to appeal (to)/an appeal
to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
to respond accordingly to/to adapt to/to cope with
complaint/to complain/to register a complaint (esp. as a customer)
